page.title: 10INDUSTRY
page.content: {PROGRESS WAY INDUSTRIAL ESTATE Progress way is a fairly old area containing many varied industries. All of the sites are used as storage depots or warehouses and those that are not in this category are not used. The average workforce in these depots is about twenty and there are many different goods stored there.These include electrical goods,foodstuffs, windows and Wimpy,the builders obviously store building materials. Wimpy is the biggest employer with about one hundred employees and the smallest is Francis Little and Sons who only employ three people.The goods are distributed locally,throughout Britain and all over the world.
